neutral.name: Neutral
neutral.description: People don't know enough about you to form an opinion

accepted.name: Accepted
accepted.description: Folks have come to accept you for your helpful nature

liked.name: Liked
liked.description: Enough news of your good works has been passed around that people like you

idolized.name: Idolized
idolized.description: Renowned for your extensive support and goodwill, you are idolized by the community

shunned.name: Shunned
shunned.description: You've left a poor impression on the community and may be shunned as a result

mixed.name: Mixed
mixed.description: A little bit good mixed with a little bit bad, people haven't figured you out yet

smilingTroublemaker.name: Smiling Troublemaker
smilingTroublemaker.description: People know you're good at heart even though you're occasionally a troublemaker

goodNaturedRascal.name: Good-Natured Rascal
goodNaturedRascal.description: Your reputation as a good-natured friend of the community manages to outshine your dark side

hated.name: Hated
hated.description: Now that folks know you're bad, most people outright hate you

sneeringPunk.name: Sneering Punk
sneeringPunk.description: Even though you've done some good for the community, people still think you're a punk

unpredictable.name: Unpredictable
unpredictable.description: No one's sure what to make of your unpredictable nature, but you've left a strong impression

darkHero.name: Dark Hero
darkHero.description: Folks still think you're some kind of hero, but you sure can be nasty sometimes

vilified.name: Vilified
vilified.description: For your overwhelmingly monstrous behavior, you have become vilified by the community

mercifulThug.name: Merciful Thug
mercifulThug.description: Despite your reputation as a thug, you are known to occasionally show a charitable side

softHeartedDevil.name: Soft-Hearted Devil
softHeartedDevil.description: Most people say you're the devil himself, but most admit you've also done a world of good

wildChild.name: Wild Child
wildChild.description: Your wild, seemingly capricious behavior leaves people scratching their heads in confusion and avoiding close contact
